◆ maxAllowed()

virtual int rev::CanvasComponent::maxAllowed ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

Max number of allowed components per scene object.

Note
Limiting to one because it would be a poor design to allow more than one canvas per object

Reimplemented from rev::Component.

◆ namespaceName()

const char* rev::CanvasComponent::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.
